definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: "Upon detection, severe administrative punishments, including heavy fines and revocations of operating licenses, will be meted out, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 在監督下，將採取包括重大罰款和吊銷執照等措施。

sentences.english: The driver's certificate has been decertified for three months.
sentences.chinese: 司機的執照已被吊銷3個月了。

sentences.english: She was ticketed for misdemeanor driving with a suspended license.
sentences.chinese: 她因明知吊銷執照而繼續駕車出行而再次被檢方起訴。

sentences.english: You are driving too fast. I think you ll get your licence suspended one day.
sentences.chinese: 你開得太快了，總有一天要被吊銷執照。

sentences.english: If he does not accept the penalty within the time limit without any justifiable reason, his motor vehicle driving license shall be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 無正當理由逾期未接受處理的，吊銷機動車駕駛證。

sentences.english: I hereby revoke all previous powers of attorney given in the above-identified application.
sentences.chinese: 本人茲此吊銷之前在上述申請中授予的所有授權書。

sentences.english: Fishermen who violate the regulation will face fines or suspension of their fishing licenses.
sentences.chinese: 違反規定的漁民將要面臨罰鍰或是吊銷捕撈許可證。

sentences.english: Kwame Kilpatrick will pay a million dollars in restitution and lose his law license.
sentences.chinese: 他將會支付一百萬賠償金並被吊銷律師牌照。

sentences.english: His practicing certificate of a notary has been revoked.
sentences.chinese: 被吊銷公證員執業證書的。

sentences.english: My H. K. Driving Licence has not been suspended or cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 本人現時的香駕駛執照並未被當局暫時吊銷或取消。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the License of Foreign-related Social Investigations shall be suspended temporarily or revoked.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，暫扣或吊銷《涉外社會調查許可證》。

sentences.english: Is your foreign license under an order of revocation or suspension by the foreign country that issued your license?
sentences.chinese: 你持有的外國執照是否被頒發國暫扣或吊銷？

sentences.english: Do not allow anyone to revoke my enterprise server licensor certificate.
sentences.chinese: 不允許任何人吊銷我的企業服務器許可方證書。

sentences.english: I think you'll get your license suspended one of these days.
sentences.chinese: 你開得太快了，我想有一天你會被吊銷執照。

sentences.english: Revocation of the business licences or the licences for advertising operation.
sentences.chinese: 吊銷營業執照或者廣告經營許可證。

sentences.english: His driver's license was revoked for hot-rodding.
sentences.chinese: 他因高速駕車被吊銷了駕照。

definition: to be transferred to another post/to post away
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
